description.zh-cn: 朝鲜历史上的国家之一，起初与高句丽、百济形成三国鼎立，后统一朝鲜半岛大部。
description.en: One of the kingdoms in the history of Korea. Initially, it formed a tripartite rivalry with Goguryeo and Baekje, and later unified most of the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 根据《三国史记》记载，新罗的创建者，被奉为始祖。
description.en: According to the Samguk Sagi, the founder of Silla, revered as its progenitor.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛南部的部落联盟，新罗的前身是其十二部落之一的斯卢。
description.en: A loose confederacy of chiefdoms in the southern Korean Peninsula, from which Silla originated as the Saro state, one of its twelve member states.

description.zh-cn: 位于朝鲜半岛南部的部落联盟，后被新罗兼并。
description.en: A confederacy of territorial polities in the southern Korean Peninsula, later annexed by Silla.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜三国之一，与新罗、百济长期对峙，后被唐与新罗联军所灭。
description.en: One of the Three Kingdoms of Korea, which was in a long-standing confrontation with Silla and Baekje, and was eventually conquered by the allied forces of Tang and Silla.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜三国之一，与新罗、高句丽长期对峙，后被唐与新罗联军所灭。
description.en: One of the Three Kingdoms of Korea, which was in a long-standing confrontation with Silla and Goguryeo, and was eventually conquered by the allied forces of Tang and Silla.

description.zh-cn: 中国朝代，曾与新罗结盟灭亡百济和高句丽，后为争夺半岛控制权与新罗交战。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that allied with Silla to conquer Baekje and Goguryeo, and later fought against Silla for control of the peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 新罗与唐朝为争夺朝鲜半岛控制权而进行的战争。
description.en: A war fought between Silla and the Tang dynasty over the control of the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 新罗统一朝鲜半岛大同江以南地区后的历史时期，社会经济繁荣发展。
description.en: The historical period after Silla unified the regions south of the Taedong River on the Korean Peninsula, characterized by prosperous social and economic development.

description.zh-cn: 新罗末期，朝鲜半岛分裂为新罗、后百济、后高句丽（后被高丽取代）三个国家的时期。
description.en: A period in the late Silla era when the Korean Peninsula was divided into three states: Silla, Later Baekje, and Later Goguryeo (later replaced by Goryeo).

description.zh-cn: 由王建建立的朝鲜王朝，最终统一了后三国，取代了新罗。
description.en: A Korean dynasty founded by Wang Geon, which eventually unified the Later Three Kingdoms and succeeded Silla.

description.zh-cn: 高丽王朝的建立者。
description.en: The founder of the Goryeo dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 新罗的国教，对国家文化和社会有深远影响。
description.en: The state religion of Silla, which had a profound influence on the country's culture and society.

description.zh-cn: 新罗第17代君主，巩固了金氏家族对王权的控制，使王位由金氏独占。
description.en: The 17th monarch of Silla, who consolidated the Kim clan's control over the throne, making the kingship exclusive to the Kim family.

description.zh-cn: 新罗第23代君主，正式确认佛教为国教，并建立骨品制。
description.en: The 23rd monarch of Silla, who officially recognized Buddhism as the state religion and established the bone-rank system.

description.zh-cn: 新罗时期特有的社会阶级制度，以血缘决定个人的社会地位和官职。
description.en: A unique social class system in Silla, where an individual's social status and official position were determined by their lineage.

description.zh-cn: 新罗真骨出身的君主，即武烈王。他的即位打破了只有圣骨才能继承王位的惯例。
description.en: A monarch of Silla from the true-bone rank, also known as King Muyeol. His ascension broke the tradition that only those of the sacred-bone rank could inherit the throne.

description.zh-cn: 新罗于682年设立的儒学教育机构，用于教育贵族子弟。
description.en: A Confucian educational institution established by Silla in 682 to educate the children of aristocrats.

description.zh-cn: 统一新罗时期的君主，设立国学，加强中央集权。
description.en: A monarch of Unified Silla who established the Gukhak (national academy) and strengthened centralized power.

description.zh-cn: 新罗末期的著名学者、文学家，曾在唐朝为官，著有《桂苑笔耕集》。
description.en: A prominent scholar and writer of late Silla, who served as an official in the Tang dynasty and authored the 'Gwon Pilgyeongjip'.

description.zh-cn: 中国唐朝末年民变领袖。
description.en: Leader of a major rebellion in late Tang dynasty China.

description.zh-cn: 由崔致远撰写的讨伐黄巢的檄文，文辞犀利。
description.en: A powerful declaration written by Choe Chiwon to denounce Huang Chao.

description.zh-cn: 后百济的建立者。
description.en: The founder of Later Baekje.

description.zh-cn: 后三国之一，由甄萱在原百济故地建立。
description.en: One of the Later Three Kingdoms, founded by Gyeon Hwon in the former territory of Baekje.

description.zh-cn: 后高句丽的建立者。
description.en: The founder of Later Goguryeo.

description.zh-cn: 后三国之一，由弓裔在原高句丽故地建立，后被王建的高丽所取代。
description.en: One of the Later Three Kingdoms, founded by Gung Ye in the former territory of Goguryeo, later replaced by Wang Geon's Goryeo.

description.zh-cn: 新罗第24代君主，在位期间新罗国力得到很大提高，疆土大幅扩张。
description.en: The 24th monarch of Silla, during whose reign Silla's power greatly increased and its territory expanded significantly.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛上的主要河流，真兴王时期新罗夺取了其流域，获得了与中国直接交通的门户。
description.en: A major river on the Korean Peninsula. Silla seized control of its basin during the reign of King Jinheung, gaining a direct gateway to China.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝在新罗设立的羁縻统治机构。
description.en: A 'loose-rein' administrative body established by the Tang dynasty in Silla.

description.zh-cn: 新罗法兴王时期的官员，为弘扬佛法而殉教，促使佛教在新罗被正式承认。
description.en: An official during the reign of King Beopheung of Silla whose martyrdom for the propagation of Buddhism led to its official recognition in Silla.

description.zh-cn: 根据《三国史记》记载，朴赫居世居西干于公元前57年创建了新罗。
description.en: According to the Samguk Sagi, Hyeokgeose of Silla founded Silla in 57 BCE.

description.zh-cn: 新罗始于辰韩十二部落之一的斯卢，是其前身。
description.en: Silla originated from Saro, one of the twelve tribes of the Jinhan confederacy, making Jinhan its predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 532年，新罗兼并了伽倻联盟。
description.en: In 532, Silla annexed the Gaya confederacy.

description.zh-cn: 551年，新罗与百济联合出兵，从高句丽手中夺回汉江流域。
description.en: In 551, Silla and Baekje formed an alliance and launched a joint military campaign to reclaim the Han River basin from Goguryeo.

description.zh-cn: 新罗攻占百济夺回的汉江下游地区后，两国结仇。
description.en: After Silla seized the lower Han River basin, which Baekje had reclaimed, the two kingdoms became enemies.

description.zh-cn: 新罗与唐朝结成军事同盟，先后于660年灭亡百济，668年灭亡高句丽。
description.en: Silla and the Tang dynasty formed a military alliance, conquering Baekje in 660 and Goguryeo in 668.

description.zh-cn: 为争夺朝鲜半岛的控制权，新罗与唐朝爆发了罗唐战争。
description.en: Silla and the Tang dynasty went to war (the Silla-Tang War) for control over the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 罗唐战争结束后，新罗完全控制大同江以南地区，开启了统一新罗时代。
description.en: After the Silla-Tang War, Silla gained full control of the territory south of the Taedong River, marking the beginning of the Unified Silla period.

description.zh-cn: 公元935年，新罗向高丽投降，新罗灭亡。
description.en: In 935 CE, Silla surrendered to Goryeo, leading to the fall of Silla.

description.zh-cn: 法兴王统治期间，新罗建立起骨品制和以此为基础的官制。
description.en: During the reign of King Beopheung, Silla established the bone-rank system and its associated bureaucracy.

description.zh-cn: 682年，神文王设立了专门研究儒家思想的国学。
description.en: In 682, King Sinmun established the Gukhak, a national academy for the study of Confucianism.

description.zh-cn: 崔致远在唐朝为官时撰写了著名的《檄黄巢书》。
description.en: While serving as an official in the Tang dynasty, Choe Chiwon wrote the famous 'Declaration Against Huang Chao'.

description.zh-cn: 该檄文条理清晰，措辞犀利，据传黄巢读到时大惊，不觉从床上掉了下来。
description.en: The declaration was clear and sharply worded; it is said that upon reading it, Huang Chao was so startled that he fell out of his bed.

description.zh-cn: 900年，甄萱在原百济故地建立后百济。
description.en: In 900, Gyeon Hwon founded Later Baekje in the former territory of Baekje.

description.zh-cn: 901年，弓裔在原高句丽故地建立后高句丽。
description.en: In 901, Gung Ye founded Later Goguryeo in the former territory of Goguryeo.

description.zh-cn: 918年，王建起兵反对弓裔，建立了高丽。
description.en: In 918, Wang Geon led a coup against Gung Ye and established Goryeo.

description.zh-cn: 王建推翻了弓裔的统治，取而代之建立了高丽。
description.en: Wang Geon overthrew the rule of Gung Ye and established Goryeo in its place.

description.zh-cn: 真兴王统治期间，新罗吞并整个汉江流域，控制了与唐朝经贸文化往来的门户。
description.en: During the reign of King Jinheung, Silla conquered the entire Han River basin, gaining control of the gateway for trade and cultural exchange with the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 新罗末期分裂成后三国，标志着其统一政权的瓦解。
description.en: The division of late Silla into the Later Three Kingdoms marked the collapse of its unified rule.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝在新罗设置鸡林州都督府，作为对新罗进行羁縻统治的机构。
description.en: The Tang dynasty established the Area Command of Jilin in Silla as a mechanism for its 'loose-rein' rule.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝设置鸡林州都督府，名义上将新罗纳入其管辖体系，进行羁縻统治。
description.en: The Tang dynasty established the Area Command of Jilin, nominally incorporating Silla into its administrative system under a 'loose-rein' policy.

description.zh-cn: 异次顿为助法兴王弘法而殉教，促使佛教在新罗开始得到官方接受。
description.en: Ichadon's martyrdom to help King Beopheung promote Buddhism led to its official acceptance in Silla.
